data.decision: Abandon Fashanus animated show project - free AI tools don't meet quality bar, too expensive to produce
data.rationale: Free AI image/video generation tools aren't producing the quality expected for an animated show. The cost to produce at acceptable quality makes the project unviable. Phase 4.4 production testing will need a different target.
alternatives: Find different production target for Phase 4.4
data.context: Fashanus was the main production target for Phase 4.4 Production Testing. Synthetic test episode completed successfully, but scaling to full production revealed quality/cost issues.
